name: El Loco Loco
description: This is the culmination of three different college honors projects. The original idea was created by myself and Hunter Keilman, who created the art for Loco Loco on the right. I learned how to create this game in Unity thanks to Youtuber CasanisPlays. This is the start in what I hope to be a long journey in game creation. Still, everyone has to start somewhere, and the experience of bringing this simple game from start to finish has taught me many things.
